title: Anger & Aggression
subtitle: Reclaiming your fire without burning everything down
description: Learn to work with anger as life force rather than suppressing it or exploding. This course covers understanding anger, feeling it fully, expressing it healthily, and channeling it into protection, boundaries, and creation.

options: Life force energy that arises when something matters

questions.question: What typically happens when anger is chronically suppressed?
options: It emerges as depression, passive aggression, or explosive outbursts
